LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnel.label: rat hole
LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnel.description: A hole dug through the ground. Someone with a small body would be able to come in and out from it.
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnel.label: drill tunnel
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnel.description: A transport pod equipped with a powerful mining drill used to bypass defenses by digging underground.
LanguageData.RK_GuerrillaTunnelSpawner.label: an earthquake center
LanguageData.RK_ThiefTunnelSpawner.label: Tremors are coming out of this spot. Something is going to come out of it.
LanguageData.RK_EmpBomb.label: emp Bomb
LanguageData.RK_EmpBomb.description: It's an EMP bomb. The only way to prevent detonation is by destroying or deconstructing it.
LanguageData.MinifiedEMP.label: minified thing
